articles.title: France slams US 'interference' in firms' diversity programmes
articles.description: France, already bristling at Trump’s moves to slap hefty tariffs on imports, hit back through the ministry of foreign trade.
articles.content:
FRANCE’S TRADE MINISTRY condemned “unacceptable” US interference after the American embassy in Paris sent several French firms letters warning against using the diversity programmes known as “DEI”, a frequent Donald Trump target.

articles.content:

articles.title: Donald Trump’s ‘there will be bombings’ threat to Iran over nuclear deal
articles.description: United States President Trump also warned Tehran of imposing secondary tariffs if it did not agree to the 'peace deal'
articles.content:
United States President Donald Trump on Sunday warned Iran of bombings if Tehran did not reach an agreement with the US over its nuclear programme.
Trump also said that secondary tariffs would be imposed on Iran if a deal was not made.
